name: Jalapeno Cole Slaw
recipe: 1/3 cup lime juice, 1 tsp sugar, 3/4 tsp kosher salt, 1/2 cup thinly sliced red onion, 1/2 cup chopped cilantro, 2 thinly sliced jalapenos, 16 oz coleslaw mix
instructions: Combine first 3 ingredients in large bowl. Add onion, cilantro, and coleslaw. Mix and add jalapenos. Toss well and chill for 1 hour

name: Fiery Chicken Tacos
recipe: 1 tsp sea salt, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp chili powder, 1 tsp paprika, 4 chicken thighs, 1 chipotle adobo, 1/4 cup chicken broth, 2 tbsp lime juice
instructions: Combine spices and cover chicken. Place spice side down on hot cast iron with oil approx. 4 minutes. Flip chicken, lower heat and cover leaving a slight gap for air. Cook til 165 internal temp. Shred chicken then return to pan with adobo, lime and broth. Heat on low and stir for 5-8 minutes.

name: Vodka Sauce Pasta
recipe: 1/2 cup vodka, tube tomato paste, basil, 10 cloves garlic, pepper flakes, heavy whippinbg cream, 1 onion, bag of pasta
instructions: Chop onion and garlic, sautee in 3 tbsps of hot oil. Add pepper flakes and tomato paste until thickened. Add vodka cream basil and butter.

name: Tikka Masala
recipe: red onion, chili powder, salt, garlic, garam masala, ginger, tomatoes on the vine, crushed tomatoes, heavy cream, butter, oil, naan, rice, water
instructions: Boil crushed tomatoes with cilantro stems in cloth. add chili powder, a cup of water, garam masala, ginger and garlic. let boil for 45 minutes, remove cloth- BLEND. In seperate pan saute diced onion, add chopped tomatoes, garlic, ginger, garam. Add two tbps of butter and blended tomatoes. Stir for 20 minutes add 1 1/2 cups of heavy cream, add proteion of choice.

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
recipe: 64 0z chicken bone broth, egg noodles, rotisserie chicken, onions, 3 carrots, 3 celery stalks, olive oil, salt and pepper
instructions: Chop veggies and shred chicken, saute veggies with oil and garlic. Immerse 2 cups of broth to mix. Add and saute chicken skin. Add all ingredients, turn off heat. Let cook until noodles are dense.

name: Tinga Poblanos
recipe: Tinga Sauce, onion, garlic, poblano peppers, cheese, steak.
instructions: Slice open and deseed poblano peppers. Cook steak until shreddable. In bowl mix beef, chopped onions, tinga sauce. Stuff bell pepper with mix and cheese of choice. Bake 1 hour at 425, add shredded cheese for last 5 minutes.

name: Roasted Bell Pepper Feta Dip
recipe: Garlic, olive oil, sauteed onions, feta, red bell pepper, salt, pepper flakes
instructions: Toss ingredients in blender until smooth
